Computer Science

  • Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (Philip C. Jackson, Jr.)
  • Artificial Intelligence - a modern approach(Stuart Russel)
  • Porgramming Collective Intelligence(Topy Segaran)
  • Data Analysis and classification for bioinformatics (Arun Jagota)
  • Making sense of data: a practical guide to exploratory data analysis and data mining (Glenn J.M)
  • Open data structures: an introduction (Pat Morin)

Mathematics

  • Probability models (John Haigh)
  • Real Analysis (John M. Howie)
  • Schaum's outline of theory and problems of introduction to probability and statistics(Seymour Li)
  • Groups, rings and fields (D.A.R. Wallace

Recreational Mathematics

  • Guesstimation: solving the world's problems on the back of a cocktail napkin (Lawrence Weinstein)
  • Graphs and their uses (Oystein Ore)
  • The mathematics of games and gambling (Edward W. Packel)

Biophysics and Organic Chemistry

  • Intermediate Organic Chemistry (B.D. Pearson)

General

  • Back to nature: the Arcadian Myth in urban America (Peter J. Schmitt)
  • The Pleasure of Finding Things Out (Richard P. Feynman)
